data.name: Voxelotl Garden
data.detailed_description:
Voxelotl are a special breed of creature that live a simple and joyful life. They live together on a simple island that provides them with all the comforts they need to survive. They have plenty of food and water, as well as places to hide if things get scary. Voxelotl are not the same breed as the traditional Axolotl in the sense that they have the unique ability to live on land. You have a special opportunity to raise some of your very own Voxelotl and earn their love and respect. Help give your new friends a life full of companionship, love, and entertainment!

Personalities
Each Voxelotl has a unique personality. Some Voxelotl may be social and some may simply want to hide from any action. Spend time with your Voxelotl to learn more about them!

Breeding
Ensure that dominant features are passed on by breeding parents with the same features. Ensure a new feature not found in either parent by breeding parents with different features. Breed to get the perfect Voxelotl!

Interact with Voxelotls
Feed them.
Play with them.
Manage hunger.
Manage sleepiness.
Change clothing.
Teach them new tricks such as dancing, singing, playing instruments, drawing, and more!

Purchase from the store
Purchase hats, special consumable items, or educational books for teaching Voxelotl new tricks.

Training Minigames
Each training game increases the creature’s skills and makes them more likely to succeed in competitions!

Run as fast as you can without hitting obstacles in our endless running training game.
Stay afloat and progress without hitting obstacles in our flight training game.
Swim deep without clashing with the local wildlife in our swim training game.
Climb as high as you can without getting hit in our strength training game.

Racing Minigame
Test the skills of your creature by entering them in the racing competition! Skills boost your Voxelotl in certain zones of races for a competitive edge based on their trained skills. Win races for unique prizes!

Multiplayer
Enjoy raising Voxelotl with a friend! Hand a friend a controller and have them bring their creatures into your garden. Train creatures together and even join competitions together and compete for prizes!

data.short_description: Raise, train, and breed Voxelotl to create the most unique Voxelotl patterns and shapes. Feed them treats to keep them happy and level up their skills in training exercises. Participate in races to test your Voxelotl’s skills. Enjoy spending time with your cute Voxelotl pets!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
